topics.body:
I decided to drive to town with one hand under my shirt.
I wanted to feel how a one-handed person drives a car.
It was difficult but not as difficult as you'd expect.

Maybe that's just me.

!https://uk.games.konami-europe.com/uploads/filemanager/source//MGS%20Timeline%20-%20The%20Joy%20-%20The%20Boss.jpg!

!http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121117233124/spongebob/images/4/44/PearlKrabs.jpg!
